Team.Name: Australia
Team.World_Cup: Won 5 World_Cup. Last year, they also won their first T20 title.
Team.Description: One of the most Successful cricket team in the world. I always love to see their games even during the exams.
Team.Player: Adam Gilchrist is my most favourite cricketer of the team forever. He is the player who can release all pressure from other players alone.
Team.Coach: Justin Langer is their head coach now
Team.Ranking: They are holding number 1 position in test format
